MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Models.Metric> ListMetrics (this Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.ICollectionOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string accountName, string databaseRid, string collectionRid, string filter);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Models.Metric> ListMetrics(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.ICollectionOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string accountName, string databaseRid, string collectionRid, string filter) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function ListMetrics (operations As ICollectionOperations, resourceGroupName As String, accountName As String, databaseRid As String, collectionRid As String, filter As String) As IEnumerable(Of Metric)
static member ListMetrics : Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.ICollectionOperations * string * string * string * string * string -> seq<Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Models.Metric>

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

An OData filter expression that describes a subset of metrics to return. The parameters that can be filtered are name.value (name of the metric, can have an or of multiple names), startTime, endTime, and timeGrain. The supported operator is eq.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given database account and collection.
